_header: Hail be Thou hend heaven Queen
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary; acrostics
_description: A hymn to the Virgin Mary, with a word-type acrostic (Aue Maria) — twelve 8-line stanzas

OxfCCC155.First Lines:
Haile be þou hende heven qweneþat thurgh chastite was
                    chosen with childe…
OxfCCC155.Last Lines:
…Als present ȝe þis prayere hereHayle be þu
                    heven quene
OxfCCC155.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 30-3.
